name: Fire Chats
description:
Gather around the fire with two friends who share vastly different opinions about the supernatural world that surrounds them. Watch over them as they debate what makes up their version of reality and you'll get to see how their destiny unfolds. Ultimately, your choices are the only ones that matter in this realm.

_______________________________________________________________________________________

Features

This game includes:

    • Animated(ish) backgrounds
    • Oddly accurate fortune readings
    • A healthy dose of skepticism
    • And three different (possibly paranormal) endings 

_______________________________________________________________________________________

*Please note: Both skeptics and believers are welcomed here.

This project was made for the NaNoRenO 2019 game jam!
